body:
Comment 6 by **runningwild**: 
Tried making a test for linux (http://golang.org/cl/5698067), but it failed.  I
think the fact that it's running as a test rather than as it's own program is what's
killing it.  I think as long as another test somewhere else does a
runtime.UnlockOSThread() during init() then it could cancel mine if it runs after I try
to lock it.
